sqlReaderQuery.value:
select B_SOURCEID,B_PUBID,
/*'HomeStoreOperationProfitCenterTracking' as B_classname,
 GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,  
    GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,  
    'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
    'semadmin' AS B_UPDATOR,*/

      SITE_NAME,SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,SITE_RAW_CITY,SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,SITE_RAW_COUNTY,FP_SITE_ID,FS_SITE_ID
from Retail.v_Tracking_Incremental_RE
where change_type='Insert'
and B_sourceid Not like '%RDC%'
UNION
select B_SOURCEID,B_PUBID,
/*'HomeStoreOperationProfitCenterTracking' as B_classname,
 GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,  
    GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,  
    'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR, 
      'semadmin' AS B_UPDATOR, 
      */
    SITE_NAME,SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,SITE_RAW_CITY,SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,SITE_RAW_COUNTY,FP_SITE_ID,FS_SITE_ID
from Retail.v_Tracking_Incremental_RE
where change_type='Update'
and B_sourceid Not like '%RDC%'
